de.must.middle
Class EntitlementStd

java.lang.Object
  de.must.middle.EntitlementStd
Direct Known Subclasses:
Entitlement
public abstract class EntitlementStd
extends java.lang.Object

Class determine rights for territories or areas. Due to different needs, territories and areas exist as alternatives, depending on individual advantages of numeric or alphanumeric classification. Hints: - Territories aren't imperatively hierarchical, they may be compared by startsWith. - Subclasses may define additional territories and areas.
